{"id":465565750,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year, 3Â months","timestamp":1615292989,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/465565750/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.1 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* head = NULL;\n        ListNode* curr = NULL;\n        ListNode* prev = NULL;\n        ListNode* l1_ptr = l1;\n        ListNode* l2_ptr = l2;\n        int carry = 0;\n        while(l1!=NULL || l2!= NULL){\n            int sum =0;\n            sum += carry;\n            if(l1!=NULL){\n                sum+= l1->val;\n                l1 = l1->next;\n            } \n            if(l2!=NULL){\n                sum+= l2->val;\n                l2 = l2->next;\n            }\n            carry = sum/10;\n            sum = sum%10;\n            ListNode* temp = new ListNode;\n            temp->val = sum;\n            if(head == NULL) head = temp;\n            if(curr==NULL && prev==NULL){\n                curr = temp;\n                prev = temp;\n            }else{\n                prev = curr;\n                curr = temp;\n                prev->next = curr;\n            } \n        }\n        if(carry){\n            ListNode* temp = new ListNode;\n            temp->val = carry;\n            if(head == NULL) head = temp;\n            if(curr==NULL && prev==NULL){\n                curr = temp;\n                prev = temp;\n            }else{\n                prev = curr;\n                curr = temp;\n                prev->next = curr;\n            }\n        }\n        return head;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
